decision_conditions: It is recommended that these trees , which are in the Gidea Park Conservation Area, can have the following works completed, the Beech tree on left hand side can be reduce by 30%.  The Pine tree is not a significant specimen, with three leaders causing potential weakness in crown, can be removed. The large Cedar tree, can have the overhang to neighbours property on right hand side reduced, the cedar can be overall crown reduce by up to 30% and thinned by 5%.

It is suggested that you engage the services of a qualified and fully insured tree surgeon to carry out the above work on your behalf (you should ask to see the contractor's insurance certificate and make sure that it is up to date).

Please note that if the work for which consent is granted is not carried out within 2 years of the date of this letter, it will be necessary to submit a fresh application if it is intended to implement the work.
description: Beech tree on left hand side reduce by 30%, Removal of pine tree as is not a significant specimen with three leaders causing potential weakness in crown, Large Cedar tree cut back overhang to neighbours property on right hand side overall crown reduce by up to 30% and thin by 5%.
